recipesJson.name: ANML Looper (Loophoria)
recipesJson.author: sp0di
recipesJson.description:
Original Source: http://e-liquid-recipes.com/recipe/1203331/ANML%20Looper%20%28Loophoria%29 by John-King-200985

Notes
After a very long time in the making, a TAKE on Phillip Rockes famous Looper.

I had 2 rules in mind for this recipe..
1. Get as close to the flavour profile of Looper.
2. Create the mix as a shake and vape.. No stupid long steep time.. 4 weeks etc.

Recommended 70/30. 0.50Ohm Duel Clapton coils. 40-50w, low airflow. I found the best flavour from the Aromamizer RDTA. Tastes good straight away but better after a couple of days. No harsh perfume taste, very smooth nice vape. Enjoy!!
